00034         // Google Places serach url's
00035         private static final String PLACES_SEARCH_URL = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/search/json?rankby=distance&";
00036         private static final String PLACES_TEXT_SEARCH_URL = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/search/json?rankby=distance&";
00037         private static final String PLACES_DETAILS_URL = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/details/json?rankby=distance&extensions=review_summary&";
00038         private static final String PLACES_PHOTO = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/photo?";

00056         // public PlacesList search(double latitude, double longitude, double
00057         // radius, String types)
00058         public PlacesList search(double latitude, double longitude, String types)
00059                         throws Exception {
00060 
00061                 this._latitude = latitude;
00062                 this._longitude = longitude;
00063                 // this._radius = radius;
00064 
00065                 try {
00066 
00067                         HttpRequestFactory httpRequestFactory = createRequestFactory(HTTP_TRANSPORT);
00068                         HttpRequest request = httpRequestFactory
00069                                         .buildGetRequest(new GenericUrl(PLACES_SEARCH_URL));
00070                         request.getUrl().put("key", API_KEY);
00071                         request.getUrl().put("location", _latitude + "," + _longitude);
00072                         request.getUrl().put("sensor", "false");
00073                         if (types != null)
00074                                 request.getUrl().put("types", types);
00075 
00076                         PlacesList list = request.execute().parseAs(PlacesList.class);
00077                         // Check log cat for places response status
00078                         Log.d("Places Status", "" + list.status);
00079                         return list;
00080 
00081                 } catch (HttpResponseException e) {
00082                         Log.e("Error:", e.getMessage());
00083                         return null;
00084                 }
00085 
00086         }
00087 
00095         public PlaceDetails getPlaceDetails(String reference) throws Exception {
00096                 try {
00097 
00098                         HttpRequestFactory httpRequestFactory = createRequestFactory(HTTP_TRANSPORT);
00099                         HttpRequest request = httpRequestFactory
00100                                         .buildGetRequest(new GenericUrl(PLACES_DETAILS_URL));
00101                         request.getUrl().put("key", API_KEY);
00102                         request.getUrl().put("reference", reference);
00103                         request.getUrl().put("sensor", "false");
00104 
00105                         PlaceDetails place = request.execute().parseAs(PlaceDetails.class);
00106 
00107                         return place;
00108 
00109                 } catch (HttpResponseException e) {
00110                         Log.e("Error in Perform Details", e.getMessage());
00111                         throw e;
00112                 }
00113         }

00116                 try {

00119                         HttpRequest request = httpRequestFactory
00120                                         .buildGetRequest(new GenericUrl(PLACES_PHOTO));

00131                         throw e;

00138         public static HttpRequestFactory createRequestFactory(
00139                         final HttpTransport transport) {
00140                 return transport.createRequestFactory(new HttpRequestInitializer() {
00141                         public void initialize(HttpRequest request) {
00142                                 GoogleHeaders headers = new GoogleHeaders();
00143                                 headers.setApplicationName("Places-Test");
00144                                 request.setHeaders(headers);
00145                                 JsonHttpParser parser = new JsonHttpParser(new JacksonFactory());
00146                                 request.addParser(parser);
00147                         }
00148                 });
00149         }
